link.title: Crawford County R-II – Home of the Wildcats

li.a: How to set up Canvas Parent Account

h2.em: Welcome to Crawford County R-II Schools

div.p:
Home of the Wildcats
#1 Wildcat Pride Dr.
Cuba, MO 65453
Phone: 573-885-2534
Fax: 573-885-3900

a.u: April 2020 CCR-II School Board Meeting Agenda

div.p: “The Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education requires students in 3rd – 8th grade to complete MAP assessments as well as High School EOC assessments in Algebra 1, Biology, Government, and English II. Cuba school students will be completing these assessments in late-April and early-May. Teachers have been preparing students and students will continue to prepare during the spring semesters. If you have any questions, please click the image below to review additional information provided by DESE.”
The Crawford County R-II School District complies with all Missouri state statutes and regulations regarding Virtual Education. All information regarding MOCAP can be found by clicking here.
